name: Mika Häkkinen
introduction: Mika Pauli Hkkinen (HARK-ee-nen or HACK-ee-nen; born 28 September 1968 in Vantaa in the Helsinki metropolitan area, Finland) is a retired Finnish racing driver and two-time Formula One World Champion.  Seven-times world champion and rival Michael Schumacher has said that Hkkinen is the man he respected the most during his Formula One career.
